message: Let's make a deal Bob. I take $60, you take $40. It's a good offer for you in the first round, consider the inflation!
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I need a better deal than 40 dollars.  This is the best I can do this round, consider the inflation!
Okay Bob, let's be reasonable. I'll take $55, you get $45.  The value is decreasing each round, so take the deal!
